channel.title: Random Access Recordings Podcast
channel.description: Welcome to the monthly Random Access Recordings podcast show featuring tech house sounds from Marcus Watkins and guests.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Give it a listen!
channel.itunes:author: Random Access Recordings
channel.itunes:summary: Welcome to the monthly Random Access Recordings podcast show featuring tech house sounds from Marcus Watkins and guests.

item.title: Random Access Recordings Podcast Show Episode 11 [RARMIX011]
item.description: Marcus Watkins - [Random Access Recordings Podcast Episode 11] 1. Twosome Bookaz - Karpaty (Dura REmix) 2. Mario Ochoa - The Fluteman 3. Crazy Erg - Electric Field 4. Antonio Plaquadio - Hold up 5. Crazy Erg - Karlsruhe 6. David Glass - Trippin 7. Falko Niestolik, Roger & Lewis - Things I Know 8. DJ Wild and Sammy - De-Dur-DH 9. Jairo - Catelo Overside (Yairos 303 Acid Mix) 10. Flo Mrzdk & Juliet Sikora - Shanti 11. David Glass - Want It Need It 12. Oliver $ - Granulated Soul (Respect to Detroit Mix) Back Again after a few months and we are back with a Bang, but this time around we our here to stay! We kick off 2012 with some booty popping, Ass droppin' tracks and remixes from the likes of Crazy Erg, Mario Ochoa and David Glass just to name a few. Welcome Back and thanks for your support!!!
item.dc:creator: Random Access Recordings
item.itunes:summary:
Marcus Watkins - [Random Access Recordings Podcast Episode 11]
1. Twosome Bookaz - Karpaty (Dura REmix) 2. Mario Ochoa - The Fluteman 3. Crazy Erg - Electric Field 4. Antonio Plaquadio - Hold up 5. Crazy Erg - Karlsruhe 6. David Glass - Trippin 7. Falko Niestolik, Roger & Lewis - Things I Know 8. DJ Wild and Sammy - De-Dur-DH 9. Jairo - Catelo Overside (Yairos 303 Acid Mix) 10. Flo Mrzdk & Juliet Sikora - Shanti 11. David Glass - Want It Need It 12. Oliver $ - Granulated Soul (Respect to Detroit Mix)
Back Again after a few months and we are back with a Bang, but this time around we our here to stay! We kick off 2012 with some booty popping, Ass droppin' tracks and remixes from the likes of Crazy Erg, Mario Ochoa and David Glass just to name a few. Welcome Back and thanks for your support!!!

item.title: Random Access Recordings Podcast Episode 010 (December Christmas Mix)
item.description:
Marcus Watkins [Random Access Recordings Podcast Episode 010] (December Christmas Mix)

1. Russo, Huxley - Bally Who
2. David Herrero - Monkey Island
3. Skeet - Come Back Raw
4. Helmut Dubnitzky - Eohh
5. Luca Bortolo - Torod
6. Peter Gelderblom & Blacktron - Burn It Up ( Blacktron Dub Mix)
7. Pedro Romero - Hannibal Smith
8. Joss Moog - My MPC Gently Weeps
9. Craig Hamilton - For You
10. DJ Sneak - Well Well Well (Hector Moralez Ghetto Mix)
11. Andhim - Drosselschnaps
12. Joss Moog - Blooming
13. Ckos - Old Tower
14. Joss Moog (Feat. Around 7) - Seventy Three

This is the Last Mix of the year for Random Access Recordings. Its a wild one hour uptempo mix that features fresh new grooves that are funky, progressive, and hypnotic. A Big Thank You goes to everyone that has contributed to the Random Access Recordings Podcast over the past 12 months... Next year (2011) we will strive to be bigger and better. Guest mixes and suggestions welcomed!  You can now check out our show on Soundcandy Radio (http://www.soundcandyradio.co.cc/).

Merry Christmas and Happy New Year.

We will bring you two dj mixes in January! See you in early 2011!

item.title: Random Access Recordings Podcast Episode 9
item.description: Marcus Watkins - [Random Access Recordings Podcast Episode 9] 1. Deep Maker - 43 2. Ein Musik - Papee 3. Deep Maker - Color Dreams 4. Makam, Kerri Chandler - You Might Lose It (Kerri Chandler Kaoz 623 Remix) 5. Maya Jane Coles - What They Say 6. Sean Miller - Chic Easy 7. Christian Smith - East Village 8. Alex Piccini - This Is Vocal 9. Christian Smith - Automatic 10. Alex Piccini - Cup Of Tea 11. Alex Piccini - Luv Me 12. Sebastian Leger - Silicone Carne 13. Out Est Le Swimming Pool - The Key (Ridney Dub Remix) This month Marcus guides you through a musical trip that has plenty of twist and turns!!! A great balance of some of the newest soulful deep house and funky raw tech house tunes!!! Enjoy
